body_html: I had the same error in the title earlier when I built (on CentOS7 with CUDA 9.0) with --config=monolithic, after removing the flag the problem went away. The installation steps are documented in https://gist.github.com/gentaiscool/a628fab5cd98953af7f46b69463394b3

body: I had the same error in the title earlier when I built (on CentOS7 with CUDA 9.0) with --config=monolithic, after removing the flag the problem went away. The installation steps are documented in https://gist.github.com/gentaiscool/a628fab5cd98953af7f46b69463394b3
